Articles.Content:
Falcon mk III

A nice 6-kerbal SSTO, which I like to launch with pair of Boosters (I know this disqualifies this configuration as SSTO, but it is orbit-capable without them)

Flies really nice in the atmosphere and is probably the best SSTO I've ever designed. Only issue is the RCS which is underpowered but manageable.

Pics: [http://imgur.com/a/VfpGx](http://imgur.com/a/VfpGx)

Constellation MkIII

A VTOL capable 20-Kerbal atmospheric transport. It flies how it looks ... heavy. But is pretty reliable and good fun to buzz KSC with. 

Pics: [http://imgur.com/a/XoeID](http://imgur.com/a/XoeID)

I will provide craft files if there's any interest.

Blue Skies!
